price: We do not send down the angels except for a just cause, and then [the disbelievers] would be granted no respite[4].
arabic: مَا نُنَزِّلُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَمَا كَانُوٓاْ إِذٗا مُّنظَرِينَ
footnotes: [4] i.e., then they would be destroyed on the spot.
